parameters.name: ContentEncoding
parameters.description:
The encoding method of the `Output` response parameter. Valid values:

*   PlainText: returns the original command content and command output.
*   Base64: returns the Base64-encoded command content and command output.

Default value: Base64.

parameters.name: IncludeHistory
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the results of historical scheduled executions. Valid values:

*   true: returns the results of historical scheduled executions. When this parameter is set to true, the `InvokeId` parameter must be set to the ID of a scheduled command task.
*   false: does not return the results of historical scheduled executions.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: InvokeId
parameters.description: The ID of the command task. You can call the [DescribeInvocations](~~64840~~) operation to query the IDs of all command tasks.

parameters.name: InvokeRecordStatus
parameters.description:
The execution state of the command task. Valid values:

*   Running
*   Finished
*   Failed
*   Stopped

> To ensure compatibility, we recommend that you use `InvocationStatus` instead of InvokeRecordStatus.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number.

Pages start from page 1.

Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 50.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the command. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. After you set this parameter, command execution results in the specified resource group are queried.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the command task.
